title: Forever Ours
description: My life is falling apart around me, and the only person I can call for help is the bane of my existence. Owen Taylor is too hot for his own good, and I’ve crushed on him most of my adult life … until he opens his mouth. All he does is argue with me, which is why I’ve never attempted to act on this little crush.Until one argument leads to him shutting me up with his mouth, and suddenly, he’s all I can think about. He’s demanding that I open up to him and let him help me. But I’ve always been an independent woman, and I don’t want my friends, Owen included, to know how bad my life has gotten. Owen won’t take no for an answer when he realizes I’m about to be homeless, setting me up in his guest room. He promises there won’t be awkwardness or complications.But there’s already a complication that neither of us are prepared for. A life-changing complication that forces us to own up to our feelings for each other. Because nine months can go by in the blink of an eye.Forever Ours is a small-town contemporary romance. It is book three of the Forever Series but can be read as a standalone. It features enemies-to-lovers, a surprise pregnancy, and a guaranteed Happily Ever After. Forever Yours features sexually explicit material, profanity, and some content that may be triggering. This book is intended for readers 18+.
author: Jennifer J. Williams
